statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main St';

SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;

SELECT products.product_name, SUM(order_items.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT p.name, p.price, p.category FROM products p WHERE p.price > 50;
SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, c.name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.quantity, p.name, p.price FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5;
